trans-unit.source: Monitoring and Troubleshooting Guide for VMM and Hyper-V Site Protection
trans-unit.target: Monitoring and Troubleshooting Guide for VMM and Hyper-V Site Protection

trans-unit.source: Azure Site Recovery coordinates the replication, failover and recovery of virtual machines located on on-premises servers to Azure or a secondary datacenter.
trans-unit.target: Azure Site Recovery coordinates the replication, failover and recovery of virtual machines located on on-premises servers to Azure or a secondary datacenter.

trans-unit.source: Use this article to monitor and troubleshoot VMM or Hyper-V Site protection.
trans-unit.target: Use this article to monitor and troubleshoot VMM or Hyper-V Site protection.

trans-unit.source: Monitor and troubleshoot protection for VMware, VMM, Hyper-V and Physical sites
trans-unit.target: Monitor and troubleshoot protection for VMware, VMM, Hyper-V and Physical sites

trans-unit.source: This Monitoring and Troubleshooting Guide enables you to learn tracking the replication health and troubleshooting techniques for Azure Site Recovery.
trans-unit.target: This Monitoring and Troubleshooting Guide enables you to learn tracking the replication health and troubleshooting techniques for Azure Site Recovery.

trans-unit.source: Understanding the components
trans-unit.target: Understanding the components

trans-unit.source: VMware/Physical Site Deployment for replication between on-premises and Azure.
trans-unit.target: VMware/Physical Site Deployment for replication between on-premises and Azure.

trans-unit.source: To setup DR between on-premises VMware/Physical machine; Configuration Server, Master Target and Process Server needs to configured.
trans-unit.target: To setup DR between on-premises VMware/Physical machine; Configuration Server, Master Target and Process Server needs to configured.

trans-unit.source: While enabling protection for the source server Azure Site Recovery will install Mobility service.
trans-unit.target: While enabling protection for the source server Azure Site Recovery will install Mobility service.

trans-unit.source: Post on-premises outage once the source server fails-over to Azure, customers needs to setup a Process Server in Azure and a Master Target server on-premises to protect the source server back to rebuilt on-premises.
trans-unit.target: Post on-premises outage once the source server fails-over to Azure, customers needs to setup a Process Server in Azure and a Master Target server on-premises to protect the source server back to rebuilt on-premises.

trans-unit.source: VMware/Physical Site Deployment for replication between on-premises & Azure
trans-unit.target: VMware/Physical Site Deployment for replication between on-premises & Azure

trans-unit.source: VMM Site Deployment for replication between on-premises site.
trans-unit.target: VMM Site Deployment for replication between on-premises site.

trans-unit.source: As part of setting up DR between two on-premises location; Azure Site Recovery Provider needs to be downloaded and installed on the VMM server.
trans-unit.target: As part of setting up DR between two on-premises location; Azure Site Recovery Provider needs to be downloaded and installed on the VMM server.

trans-unit.source: Provider needs internet connectivity to ensure that all the operations triggered from Azure Portal gets translated to on-premises operations like enable protection, shutdown primary side virtual machines as part of failovers etc.
trans-unit.target: Provider needs internet connectivity to ensure that all the operations triggered from Azure Portal gets translated to on-premises operations like enable protection, shutdown primary side virtual machines as part of failovers etc.

trans-unit.source: VMM Site Deployment for replication between on-premises site
trans-unit.target: VMM Site Deployment for replication between on-premises site

trans-unit.source: VMM Site Deployment for replication between on-premises & Azure.
trans-unit.target: VMM Site Deployment for replication between on-premises & Azure.

trans-unit.source: As part of setting up DR between on-premises & Azure; Azure Site Recovery Provider needs to be downloaded and installed on the VMM server along with Azure Recovery Services Agent which needs to be installed on each Hyper-V host.
trans-unit.target: As part of setting up DR between on-premises & Azure; Azure Site Recovery Provider needs to be downloaded and installed on the VMM server along with Azure Recovery Services Agent which needs to be installed on each Hyper-V host.

trans-unit.source: Refer [Understanding Site to Azure Protection](./site-recovery-understanding-site-to-azure-protection.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Refer [Understanding Site to Azure Protection](./site-recovery-understanding-site-to-azure-protection.md) for more information.

trans-unit.source: VMM Site Deployment for replication between on-premises & Azure
trans-unit.target: VMM Site Deployment for replication between on-premises & Azure

trans-unit.source: Hyper-V Site Deployment for replication between on-premises & Azure
trans-unit.target: Hyper-V Site Deployment for replication between on-premises & Azure

trans-unit.source: This is same as that of VMM Deployment – only difference being Provider & Agent gets installed on the Hyper-V host itself.
trans-unit.target: This is same as that of VMM Deployment – only difference being Provider & Agent gets installed on the Hyper-V host itself.

trans-unit.source: Refer [Understanding Site to Azure Protection](./site-recovery-understanding-site-to-azure-protection.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Refer [Understanding Site to Azure Protection](./site-recovery-understanding-site-to-azure-protection.md) for more information.

trans-unit.source: Monitor configuration, protection and recovery operations
trans-unit.target: Monitor configuration, protection and recovery operations

trans-unit.source: Every operation in ASR gets audited and is tracked under the “JOBS” tab.
trans-unit.target: Every operation in ASR gets audited and is tracked under the “JOBS” tab.

trans-unit.source: In case of any configuration, protection or recovery error navigate to the JOBS tab and see if there are any failures.
trans-unit.target: In case of any configuration, protection or recovery error navigate to the JOBS tab and see if there are any failures.

trans-unit.source: Monitor configuration, protection and recovery operations
trans-unit.target: Monitor configuration, protection and recovery operations

trans-unit.source: Once you find failures under the JOBS view, select the JOB and click ERROR DETAILS for that job.
trans-unit.target: Once you find failures under the JOBS view, select the JOB and click ERROR DETAILS for that job.

trans-unit.source: Monitor configuration, protection and recovery operations
trans-unit.target: Monitor configuration, protection and recovery operations

trans-unit.source: The error details will help you identify possible cause and recommendation for the issue.
trans-unit.target: The error details will help you identify possible cause and recommendation for the issue.

trans-unit.source: Monitor configuration, protection and recovery operations
trans-unit.target: Monitor configuration, protection and recovery operations

trans-unit.source: In the above case there seems to be another operation which is in progress because of which Protection configuration is failing.
trans-unit.target: In the above case there seems to be another operation which is in progress because of which Protection configuration is failing.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that you resolve the issue as per the recommendation – there-after click RESART to re-initiate the operation.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that you resolve the issue as per the recommendation – there-after click RESART to re-initiate the operation.

trans-unit.source: Monitor configuration, protection and recovery operations
trans-unit.target: Monitor configuration, protection and recovery operations

trans-unit.source: Option to RESTART is not available for all operations – for those which doesn’t have the RESTART option navigate back to the object and redo the operation once again.
trans-unit.target: Option to RESTART is not available for all operations – for those which doesn’t have the RESTART option navigate back to the object and redo the operation once again.

trans-unit.source: Every JOB can be cancelled at any point of time while in-progress using the CANCEL button.
trans-unit.target: Every JOB can be cancelled at any point of time while in-progress using the CANCEL button.

trans-unit.source: Monitor configuration, protection and recovery operations
trans-unit.target: Monitor configuration, protection and recovery operations

trans-unit.source: Monitor replication health for virtual machine
trans-unit.target: Monitor replication health for virtual machine

trans-unit.source: ASR provider central & remote monitoring through the Azure Portal for each of the protected entities.
trans-unit.target: ASR provider central & remote monitoring through the Azure Portal for each of the protected entities.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the PROTECTED ITEMS there-after select VMM CLOUDS or PROTECTION GROUPS.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the PROTECTED ITEMS there-after select VMM CLOUDS or PROTECTION GROUPS.

trans-unit.source: VMM CLOUDS tab is only for VMM based deployments and all other scenarios have the protected entities under PROTECTION GROUPS tab.
trans-unit.target: VMM CLOUDS tab is only for VMM based deployments and all other scenarios have the protected entities under PROTECTION GROUPS tab.

trans-unit.source: Monitor replication health for virtual machine
trans-unit.target: Monitor replication health for virtual machine

trans-unit.source: There-after select the protected entity under the respective cloud or the protection group.
trans-unit.target: There-after select the protected entity under the respective cloud or the protection group.

trans-unit.source: Once you select the protected entity all allowed operations are shown in the bottom pane.
trans-unit.target: Once you select the protected entity all allowed operations are shown in the bottom pane.

trans-unit.source: Monitor replication health for virtual machine
trans-unit.target: Monitor replication health for virtual machine

trans-unit.source: As shown above in-case the virtual machine HEALTH is critical – you can click the ERROR DETAILS button on the bottom to see the error.
trans-unit.target: As shown above in-case the virtual machine HEALTH is critical – you can click the ERROR DETAILS button on the bottom to see the error.

trans-unit.source: Based on the “Possible causes” and “Recommendation” mentioned resolve the issue.
trans-unit.target: Based on the “Possible causes” and “Recommendation” mentioned resolve the issue.

trans-unit.source: Monitor replication health for virtual machine
trans-unit.target: Monitor replication health for virtual machine

trans-unit.source: Monitor replication health for virtual machine
trans-unit.target: Monitor replication health for virtual machine

trans-unit.source: Note: If there are any active operations which are in-progress or failed then navigate to the JOBS view as mentioned earlier to view the JOB specific error.
trans-unit.target: Note: If there are any active operations which are in-progress or failed then navigate to the JOBS view as mentioned earlier to view the JOB specific error.

trans-unit.source: Troubleshoot on-premises Hyper-V issues
trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot on-premises Hyper-V issues

trans-unit.source: Connect to the on-premises Hyper-V manager console, select the virtual
trans-unit.target: Connect to the on-premises Hyper-V manager console, select the virtual

trans-unit.source: machine and see the replication health.
trans-unit.target: machine and see the replication health.

trans-unit.source: Troubleshoot on-premises Hyper-V issues
trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot on-premises Hyper-V issues

trans-unit.source: In this case *Replication Health* is being indicated as Critical – *View Replication Health* to see the details.
trans-unit.target: In this case *Replication Health* is being indicated as Critical – *View Replication Health* to see the details.

trans-unit.source: Troubleshoot on-premises Hyper-V issues
trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot on-premises Hyper-V issues

trans-unit.source: For cases where replication is paused for the virtual machine, right-click Select *Replication*->*Resume replication*
trans-unit.target: For cases where replication is paused for the virtual machine, right-click Select *Replication*->*Resume replication*

trans-unit.source: ![Troubleshoot on-premises Hyper-V issues](media/site-recovery-monitoring-and-troubleshooting/image19.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Troubleshoot on-premises Hyper-V issues](media/site-recovery-monitoring-and-troubleshooting/image19.png)

trans-unit.source: In case virtual machine migrates a new Hyper-V host (within the cluster or a standalone machine), which has been configured through ASR, replication for the virtual machine wouldn't be impacted.
trans-unit.target: In case virtual machine migrates a new Hyper-V host (within the cluster or a standalone machine), which has been configured through ASR, replication for the virtual machine wouldn't be impacted.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the new Hyper-V host meets all the per-requisites and is configured using ASR.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that the new Hyper-V host meets all the per-requisites and is configured using ASR.

trans-unit.source: Hyper-V Replication Logging Options
trans-unit.target: Hyper-V Replication Logging Options

trans-unit.source: All events pertaining to Hyper-V Replica are logged in the Hyper-V-VMMS\\Admin log located under **Applications and Services Logs\\Microsoft\\Windows**.
trans-unit.target: All events pertaining to Hyper-V Replica are logged in the Hyper-V-VMMS\\Admin log located under **Applications and Services Logs\\Microsoft\\Windows**.

trans-unit.source: In addition, an Analytic log can be enabled for Hyper-V-VMMS.
trans-unit.target: In addition, an Analytic log can be enabled for Hyper-V-VMMS.

trans-unit.source: To enable this log, first make the Analytic and Debug logs viewable in the Event Viewer.
trans-unit.target: To enable this log, first make the Analytic and Debug logs viewable in the Event Viewer.

trans-unit.source: Open Event Viewer, then in the **View menu**, click **Show Analytic and Debug logs**.
trans-unit.target: Open Event Viewer, then in the **View menu**, click **Show Analytic and Debug logs**.

trans-unit.source: Troubleshoot on-premises Hyper-V issues
trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot on-premises Hyper-V issues

trans-unit.source: An Analytic log is visible under Hyper-V-VMMS
trans-unit.target: An Analytic log is visible under Hyper-V-VMMS

trans-unit.source: Troubleshoot on-premises Hyper-V issues
trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot on-premises Hyper-V issues

trans-unit.source: In the **Actions** pane, click on **Enable Log**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Actions** pane, click on **Enable Log**.

trans-unit.source: Once enabled, it
trans-unit.target: Once enabled, it

trans-unit.source: appears in **Performance Monitor** as an Event Trace Session located
trans-unit.target: appears in **Performance Monitor** as an Event Trace Session located

trans-unit.source: under **Data Collector Sets.**
trans-unit.target: under **Data Collector Sets.**

trans-unit.source: Troubleshoot on-premises Hyper-V issues
trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot on-premises Hyper-V issues

trans-unit.source: To view the information collected, first stop the tracing session by disabling the log, and then save the log and re-open it in Event Viewer or use other tools to convert it as desired.
trans-unit.target: To view the information collected, first stop the tracing session by disabling the log, and then save the log and re-open it in Event Viewer or use other tools to convert it as desired.

trans-unit.source: Reaching out for Microsoft Support
trans-unit.target: Reaching out for Microsoft Support

trans-unit.source: Log collection
trans-unit.target: Log collection

trans-unit.source: For VMM Site protection, refer [ASR Log Collection using Support Diagnostics Platform (SDP) Tool](http://social.technet.microsoft.com/wiki/contents/articles/28198.asr-data-collection-and-analysis-using-the-vmm-support-diagnostics-platform-sdp-tool.aspx)
trans-unit.target: For VMM Site protection, refer [ASR Log Collection using Support Diagnostics Platform (SDP) Tool](http://social.technet.microsoft.com/wiki/contents/articles/28198.asr-data-collection-and-analysis-using-the-vmm-support-diagnostics-platform-sdp-tool.aspx)

trans-unit.source: to collect the required logs.
trans-unit.target: to collect the required logs.

trans-unit.source: For Hyper-V Site protection, download the
trans-unit.target: For Hyper-V Site protection, download the

trans-unit.source: [tool](https://dcupload.microsoft.com/tools/win7files/DIAG_ASRHyperV_global.DiagCab)
trans-unit.target: [tool](https://dcupload.microsoft.com/tools/win7files/DIAG_ASRHyperV_global.DiagCab)

trans-unit.source: & execute it on the Hyper-V host to collect the logs.
trans-unit.target: & execute it on the Hyper-V host to collect the logs.

trans-unit.source: For VMware/Physical scenarios, refer [Azure Site Recovery Log Collection for VMware and Physical site protection](http://social.technet.microsoft.com/wiki/contents/articles/30677.azure-site-recovery-log-collection-for-vmware-and-physical-site-protection.aspx)
trans-unit.target: For VMware/Physical scenarios, refer [Azure Site Recovery Log Collection for VMware and Physical site protection](http://social.technet.microsoft.com/wiki/contents/articles/30677.azure-site-recovery-log-collection-for-vmware-and-physical-site-protection.aspx)

trans-unit.source: to collect the required logs.
trans-unit.target: to collect the required logs.

trans-unit.source: Tool collects the logs locally under a randomly named sub-folder under **%LocalAppData%\ElevatedDiagnostics**
trans-unit.target: Tool collects the logs locally under a randomly named sub-folder under **%LocalAppData%\ElevatedDiagnostics**

trans-unit.source: Sample steps shown from Hyper-V site protection.
trans-unit.target: Sample steps shown from Hyper-V site protection.

trans-unit.source: Opening a support ticket
trans-unit.target: Opening a support ticket

trans-unit.source: To raise support ticket for ASR, reach out to Azure Support using the
trans-unit.target: To raise support ticket for ASR, reach out to Azure Support using the

trans-unit.source: URL at <http://aka.ms/getazuresupport>
trans-unit.target: URL at <http://aka.ms/getazuresupport>

trans-unit.source: Understand & Troubleshoot Hyper-V Replica Guide
trans-unit.target: Understand & Troubleshoot Hyper-V Replica Guide

trans-unit.source: Common ASR errors and their resolutions
trans-unit.target: Common ASR errors and their resolutions

trans-unit.source: Below are the common errors that you may hit and their resolutions.
trans-unit.target: Below are the common errors that you may hit and their resolutions.

trans-unit.source: Each of the error is documented in a separate WIKI page.
trans-unit.target: Each of the error is documented in a separate WIKI page.

trans-unit.source: Setup
trans-unit.target: Setup

trans-unit.source: The VMM server cannot be registered due to an internal error.
trans-unit.target: The VMM server cannot be registered due to an internal error.

trans-unit.source: Please refer to the jobs view in the Site Recovery Portal for more details on the error.
trans-unit.target: Please refer to the jobs view in the Site Recovery Portal for more details on the error.

trans-unit.source: Run Setup again to register the server.
trans-unit.target: Run Setup again to register the server.

trans-unit.source: A connection can’t be established to the Hyper-V Recovery Manager vault.
trans-unit.target: A connection can’t be established to the Hyper-V Recovery Manager vault.

trans-unit.source: Verify the proxy settings or try again later.
trans-unit.target: Verify the proxy settings or try again later.

trans-unit.source: Configuration
trans-unit.target: Configuration

trans-unit.source: Unable to create Protection Group: An error occurred while retrieving the list of servers.
trans-unit.target: Unable to create Protection Group: An error occurred while retrieving the list of servers.

trans-unit.source: Hyper-V host cluster contains at least one static network adapter, or no connected adapters are configured to use DHCP.
trans-unit.target: Hyper-V host cluster contains at least one static network adapter, or no connected adapters are configured to use DHCP.

trans-unit.source: VMM does not have permissions to complete an action
trans-unit.target: VMM does not have permissions to complete an action

trans-unit.source: Can't select the storage account within the subscription while configuring protection
trans-unit.target: Can't select the storage account within the subscription while configuring protection

trans-unit.source: Protection
trans-unit.target: Protection

trans-unit.source: Enable protection failed since Agent not installed on host machine
trans-unit.target: Enable protection failed since Agent not installed on host machine

trans-unit.source: A suitable host for the replica virtual machine can't be found - Due to low compute resources
trans-unit.target: A suitable host for the replica virtual machine can't be found - Due to low compute resources

trans-unit.source: A suitable host for the replica virtual machine can't be found - Due to no logical network attached
trans-unit.target: A suitable host for the replica virtual machine can't be found - Due to no logical network attached

trans-unit.source: Cannot connect to the replica host machine - connection could not be established
trans-unit.target: Cannot connect to the replica host machine - connection could not be established

trans-unit.source: Live migration error 23848 - The virtual machine is going to be moved using type Live.
trans-unit.target: Live migration error 23848 - The virtual machine is going to be moved using type Live.

trans-unit.source: This could break the recovery protection status of the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: This could break the recovery protection status of the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: Recovery
trans-unit.target: Recovery

trans-unit.source: VMM cannot complete the host operation -
trans-unit.target: VMM cannot complete the host operation -

trans-unit.source: Fail over to the selected recovery point for virtual machine: General access denied error.
trans-unit.target: Fail over to the selected recovery point for virtual machine: General access denied error.

trans-unit.source: Hyper-V failed to fail over to the selected recovery point for virtual machine: Operation aborted Try a more recent recovery point.
trans-unit.target: Hyper-V failed to fail over to the selected recovery point for virtual machine: Operation aborted Try a more recent recovery point.

trans-unit.source: A connection with the server could not be established (0x00002EFD)
trans-unit.target: A connection with the server could not be established (0x00002EFD)

trans-unit.source: Hyper-V failed to enable reverse replication for virtual machine
trans-unit.target: Hyper-V failed to enable reverse replication for virtual machine

trans-unit.source: Hyper-V failed to enable replication for virtual machine virtual machine
trans-unit.target: Hyper-V failed to enable replication for virtual machine virtual machine

trans-unit.source: Could not commit failover for virtual machine
trans-unit.target: Could not commit failover for virtual machine

trans-unit.source: The recovery plan contains virtual machines which are not ready for planned failover
trans-unit.target: The recovery plan contains virtual machines which are not ready for planned failover

trans-unit.source: The virtual machine isn't ready for planned failover
trans-unit.target: The virtual machine isn't ready for planned failover

trans-unit.source: Virtual machine is not running and is not powered off
trans-unit.target: Virtual machine is not running and is not powered off

trans-unit.target: Out of band operation happened on a virtual machine and commit failover failed

trans-unit.target: Test Failover

trans-unit.source: Failover could not be initiated since test failover is in progress
trans-unit.target: Failover could not be initiated since test failover is in progress

trans-unit.source: Configuration Server, Process Server, Master Target
trans-unit.target: Configuration Server, Process Server, Master Target

trans-unit.source: Configuration Server (CS), Process Server (PS), Master Targer (MT)
trans-unit.target: Configuration Server (CS), Process Server (PS), Master Targer (MT)

trans-unit.source: The ESXi host on which the PS/CS is hosted as a VM fails with a purple screen of death.
trans-unit.target: The ESXi host on which the PS/CS is hosted as a VM fails with a purple screen of death.

trans-unit.source: Remote desktop troubleshooting after failover
trans-unit.target: Remote desktop troubleshooting after failover

trans-unit.source: Many customers have faced issues to connect to the failed over VM in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Many customers have faced issues to connect to the failed over VM in Azure.

trans-unit.source: [Use the troubleshooting document to RDP into the VM](http://social.technet.microsoft.com/wiki/contents/articles/31666.troubleshooting-remote-desktop-connection-after-failover-using-asr.aspx)
trans-unit.target: [Use the troubleshooting document to RDP into the VM](http://social.technet.microsoft.com/wiki/contents/articles/31666.troubleshooting-remote-desktop-connection-after-failover-using-asr.aspx)
